title: Fabrication and characteristics of new quaternized chitosan nanocapsules loaded with thymol or thyme essential oil as effective SARS-CoV-2 inhibitors
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29330-29343
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03298E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Nashwa M. Mahmoud, Abdel Moneim Y. Abdel Moneim, Omeed Darweesh, Enas I. El Zahaby, Reda F. M. Elshaarawy, Yasser A. Hassan, Mohamed G. Seadawy
This research explores the potential of encapsulating thyme essential oil (TEO) and thymol (TH) into quaternized chitosan nanocapsules to combat SARS-CoV-2.
